cox5529.storage

Class Pitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • cox5529.storage.Pitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Pitch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class used to store the occurrences of a given pitch within a song.
    Author:
    Brandon Cox
    See Also:

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> calcPercentage()
        Gets the percentage of notes followed by a specific pitch
        Returns:
